content.detailedDescription: Walked out front door of home to take dog outside.  noticed flickering lights that did not resemble a plane's lights or satellite or iss.  the path wobbled but not particularly fast or slow.  went back into house for binoculars.  with binoculars, could see chevron or boomerang shape.  path started from sw and headed south to north.  it seemed to go behind a cloud and then all lights [and  shape] disappeared.  rather than thinking what if might be, it was more like what it was not.  feelings were "wow" and "i wish i could see more".
content.summary: Lights flickered,  path wobbled, abruptly disappeared or lights went out

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were walking to the store when we noticed that there were a bunch of lights in a circular formation off to the east of the way we were walking it was a huge set of lights that was over the town of nampa idaho it was over by the city we could tell because there is a bunch of light pollution over there my first initial thought was that it was a ufo so we kept watching it it did not make any movement any noise it did not do anything except for sit there and we have noticed that we have never noticed lights like that over there before and we have walked this path many many times so we just kept watching as we were walking  my first initial feelings and reactions were smiling yet little nervous wondering what it could be thinking it was a ufo i got chills all over my body me and my girlfriend began talking about it little worried but we were going and i noticed that we were sitting there looking at it for a good 25 minutes or so until we ran into a cornfield where we lost sight of it eventualy we lost sight of it continue our way to the store on our way back it was gone not a single sight of it nowhere to be found just gone
content.summary: Large set of lights in circular formation in a stationary spot.

content.detailedDescription: These comments are made to me - the field investigator - by the witness to the event. she was driving south on hwy 61 toward burlington and was near the small town of mediapolis when she noticed a bright light in the sky to the se angling down toward the ground. it seemed to be a round object and it was about a mile away. it was traveling about the speed of a small airplane. the color was a pinkish red. as it came closer to the car, it stopped suddenly and hovered for awhile, before continuing to descend toward an open field in the distance. the field was probably a mile or so away. as the object dropped out of sight, a trail of smoke was left behind it. then, just as suddenly as the first object appeared, a second object appeared moving in the same direction on the same flight path. it also descended out of sight. it was a clear night, but dark, and we decided not to stop and try to see where these objects landed. there were no sounds coming from either craft. and when they landed, there was no explosion or any other kind of sound. the witness at one point said to her passengers, "look at this!" when she said this, the first object stopped briefly and hovered. she felt that she was being observed while it hovered. the witness cannot remember to exact time of year this event occurred, only that no crops had yet come up in the fields around them. the first object was visible for about 5 minutes and the second for another 2 minutes or so. traffic on hwy 61 was thin that night. there was a slight breeze. and all the windows on the car were rolled down.
content.summary: Objects observed moving south to north angling down with one hovering briefly

content.detailedDescription: In october of last year (2014) me and my boyfriend were driving home from a friends house. we had just turned onto my road and had only about 5 minutes till we were at my house. it was about 1:30 am. i was driving down my road like i always do when all of a sudden something to the east caught my attention. to the east of the road there is a field that goes for about a mile then ends and turns into a long tree line. above the tree line there was two orange lights hovering in the sky. they were bright lights, but also had a dimness to them. both objects were disc shaped and about the same size. they were hovering about 20-30 feet above the tree line and about 10 feet apart from each other. also they were exactly diagonal to each other. once i noticed them i immediatly stopped my car and started asking my boyfriend if he noticed them. he did, so we decided to sit there and see what they did. for a couple minutes they were just hovering in the same spot, never moving. then the two discs started moving closer to each other. it was all of a sudden like they just fused together. it went from being two disc like orange objects to being one big disc like orange object, almost like they connected together. at this point me and my boyfriend were extremely fascinated. i knew i had to get it on camera or tell someone what i was seeing. i decided to call my friend who's house we had just left. i was parked in the middle of the road, so i figured before i did all this i would pull my car over and turn my headlights off, so i did. after i pulled the car over and turned all the lights off i went to call my friend. this is when things started to get really really weird for us. my call started to go through, i heard one ring, and part of another ring, then my phone started making noises i've never heard before, and never heard since. the only description i have for it was it was making like a fax machine type noise. a lot of ringing and buzzing. then my phone shut off. which i still can't figure out because i still had at least 50% of my battery left. i looked up at my boyfriend and started freaking out and telling him my phone died. he looked up at me and at first was just listening to me. i remember he was looking somewhat past me, i knew he was looking at the strange object. all of a sudden, and i remember it happened within a matter of seconds, my boyfriends eyes got huge and his facial expression went from curious to terrified. without even hesitation he started yelling at me to drive away. i turned to see what was causing such a reaction from him, and i remember just seeing it and having such a nightmarish feeling come over me. when i looked back the object was a lot closer than it had originally been, and it was heading right in our direction. when we were watching it before from my car when it was above the tree line it was about 2 miles from us. when i turned after my boyfriend started freaking out it was less than a mile from us. i remember it was coming so fast at us i almost didn't know what to do. i wanted to stay put and see what it did. but i remember this terrified feeling came over me. something was telling me it wasn't friendly and that i need to drive away. i felt a scary very non friendly presence from it. i quickly turned my car on and started speeding away. i remember my boyfriend saying "it's coming, its right above us" and yelling at my to go faster. at this point i was going 90 mph trying to desperately get away from it. but my boyfriend kept saying it was getting closer. i didn't wanna look at it because of how fast i was going but i knew i had to see what he was seeing. i pushed the brakes alittle bit to slow down and quickly turned my head to see what was going on. to this day, i still clear as day remember what i saw when i looked back and will never forget about it. when i turned around it was only about 30 feet from my car. it was about north east from my car. i remember seeing a large triangle. it had 3 whitish orange lights around the bottom and a big red light in the middle of the bottom. one odd thing  i noticed was the red light was shaped like an orb. i could see it shaped as a perfect circle, almost like it was floating in the bottom of the triangle. the rest of the triangle was really dark, almost black. but weirdly kind of transparent. i remember it was kind of like wobbling while it was hovering towards us. seeing that scared the life out of me, so i quickly turned back and speed faster away. but all of a sudden my boyfriend said it vanished. i turned again and he was right, it was just gone!! i stopped my car and looked all over the sky. we even got out of my car and looked all around to see if we seen it. but no there was nothing! we didn't know what to do so we just went home and never really talked about it much to anyone. whenever i try to tell people they always just say it was a plane or helicopter. but we know what we saw!
content.summary: Orange disc in michigan

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out of our metal building and looked up towards the north west and seen 3 black triangle crafts flying in triangle formation heading south west. they were about the size of a cessna plane about 1000 feet up. they made no noise at all. i live in the country so no background noise at all. around 5 minutes later i seen another 1 heading in the same direction as the other 3. straight flying no noise out of that one either. we have alot of planes fly over our house so i'm always looking up but most of the time i hear the noise and then look but these did not make any noise at all.
content.summary: Observed 3 crafts flying formation  sw about 5 minutes later 1 more no noise

content.detailedDescription: I had just stepped out of the backdoor to get something when i heard an airplane so looked up and saw a small passenger jet go over . that is when i noticed what i thought was maybe a chrome aircraft because it was shining very bright, so bright that i could not make out what kind of aircraft. then i noticed that it was heading toward four very similar objects , one was moving slowly south away from the rest so i focused on the ones that were closer together trying to figure out what they were. as one of them was moving east going behind the trees i went to the front yard to get a  better angle. when i got to the front of the house the one moving east continued to disappear behind trees and the first one i saw stopped near the other two then slowly began to go east . so i looked around to see if anyone else was seeing this too , seeing nobody around i thought i need to get a picture of this. so i ran inside and grabbed my wife's phone and when i got back outside there were only two that i could see and when i tried to take a picture it was so bright outside that i couldn't see anything on the phone screen . that is when i heard talking behind me , hoping that someone else was seeing this i turned to look . i saw my neighbors looking the other way so i turned back to keep trying to get a picture but and in the two to three seconds it took me to look behind me and look back they were gone. i then spent the next half hour walking around looking at nothing but clear blue sky. i asked a friend i saw as i walking around and they saw nothing.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Five highly reflective or brightly glowing orbs moving and stopping

content.detailedDescription:
In late summer of 1987, myself and a close friend were out driving around the local area. i had recently passed my driving test and so took every opportunity to drive around. at around 10pm on the night in question, we drove along a little dirt track which lead to a scrap yard. either side of the narrow potholed track was a drainage ditch and mature trees which formed a tree tunnel. it was quite dark at the time as there were very few street lights. we drove carefully along the track for approximately 300 to 400 meters. this was when we both noticed the object. it appeared to be at the top of the tree tunnel (approximately 20 to 30ft above the ground) and about 20ft ahead of us. as soon as we saw it, we stopped the car to look at it. it appeared the size of a small television (around 3ft x 3ft) but totally square. it was pure white light with perfect right angled corners. no light was reflected from it into anything at all. we watched for approx 30 seconds when it suddenly disappeared. to describe how, i would say like an old fashioned television being turned off where the light disappears from the outside first and eventually leaves just a small white dot in the middle before disappearing altogether. when this happened, my friend and i just looked at each other as if to ask if we both really saw what just happened. hardly more than 2 to 3 seconds later, the white square reappeared directly in front of my car (about 5ft in front of it) with the bottom edge where i would imagine e the ground to be. basically what i'm saying is it was at ground level. but this time it was 20 to 30ft square. we both screamed in what i guess was fear and i immediately put the car into reverse and retreated back along the track as fast as i dared (which wasn't very fast as i feared that the car may go off the track and end up in a drainage ditch). we left the scene and returned at around 9am the following morning to see if there was any rational explanation. we found absolutely nothing to suggest any rational explanation. 
i have reported this once before around 8 year ago to yahoo answers but all i received in return were questions about what drugs i was taking at the time which i found quite insulting. i was 18 years old, never drank alcohol and never touched any drugs of any kind and neither did my friend.
content.summary: Small white square in trees. then appeared as large white square in front of me.

content.detailedDescription: I was working as a security officer at the feast of portland. i stood at the main gate all day. around 5pm i happened to look up and saw what i can only describe as a "classic" disk shaped object headed from the south and flying over the ross island bridge. i was practically under the bridge so i didn't see it until it came over the bridge. it then turned south and headed towards se portland. it made no sound. it looked like it was around 15-20 feet across and about 10 feet tall. it then was about a half of a mile away from me over se when it stopped for a second then started making left and right movements. it swung left to right then left again pretty quickly kind of like it was on a pendulum. i started to question whether was a drone or something like an aircraft at this point. i wanted to take my phone out to shoot a video but my supervisor was somewhere nearby and we aren't allowed to use our personal phones. it made the quick maneuvers left to right about 5 times then all if a sudden it stopped moving then simply vanished! i got chills down my back just then because i realized that it definitely wasn't a drone or something manmade. it completely dissapeared. i had a very clear view of it when it dissapeared and i can't explain  how it did what it did. one second it was there and the next it was gone. it definitely didn't take off quickly or fly away. i felt that i couldn't tell my coworkers or supervisor because they would have thought i was crazy so i didnt talk about it until i came home and told my wife the story. my heart was racing for quite a while after it happened. the whole rest of my shift i kept looking up into the sky looking for it or anything else out of the ordinary. i've seen lights before at night and also i've witnessed black orbs flying overhead during the day but i have never witnessed something move or disappear like that before. i felt like i have seen something very special which is why i have decided to make this report.
content.summary: Classic disk shaped colored from silver shiny to black-ish

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from sedona, az to monument valley navajo tribal park on friday, september 18, 2015. i was taking pictures of the first glimpses of buttes and mesas, with iphone 4s, while driving towards monument valley navajo tribal park (photo taken approximately half way between kayenta, az and entrance to monument valley). the time of the image was between 4:45pm and 5:15pm.

after coming back home to sedona, az, i was reviewing the pictures i took of monument valley and noticed that i captured 2 ufos in the attached digital photo. i did not notice the objects in the sky at the time of taking the pictures (since i was focusing on the buttes and mesas).
content.summary: Captured apparent ufos while driving to monument valley navajo tribal park

content.detailedDescription: My daughter sent this to me. view this on facebook bjcorona video drinks at the hotel bar. stephanie corona salerno. they caught lights in the upper right corner, its awesome.
content.summary: Over water

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i took a walk around our neighbor hood and on the way back i seen flashing lights in the sky 3 difrent ones and while we where observing them you could see plains flying by and could tell that it wasn't any known aircraft i took a video of the three hovering  then we continued to walk back home noticing them the whole way then one of them took off slowly and i took another video of it heading north. after taking the video looked back to see the other ones and they where gone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three flashing lights hovering over my neighbor hood then took off slowly after about 10 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were observing stars in the clear dusk sky at about 7 pm on sunday, sept 20, 2015. we both noticed a long greyish object hoevering in the north sky, approx. 1/4 to 1/2 mile above the hills behind the columbia river. it was approx. 300 to 600 feet long or maybe even larger at times because it kept changing shape. it was odd because there were no other clouds in the sky and it did not move for about 45 minutes. 2 high flying commercial jets flew near its general area, far above this object, giving us a clear point of reference to it's height. it changed shapes from a flat oblong shape to a dome shape with expansive wing looking features, then elongating horizontally, then diminshing back to a dome shape. we observed 2 or 3 smaller objects decsend from it then ascend back into it during this 45 minute period of time. this large object never moved. as the night changed from dusk to dark, the object seemed to diminsh and disappear but never moved in any direction. the lighting to take pictures was poor and my camera could not pick up the image. it was definitely artificial and not clouds or smoke rising up. my son and i both witnessed this event with a clear and rational perspective.
content.summary: Very large elongated object, grey in color that changed shapes and stationary for about 1 hour. aprox 3 or 4 small objets seen coming in and out.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i took a walk around our neighbor hood and on the way back i seen flashing lights in the sky 3 difrent ones and while we where observing them you could see plains flying by and could tell that it wasn't any known aircraft i took a video of the three hovering  then we continued to walk back home noticing them the whole way then one of them took off slowly and i took another video of it heading north. after taking the video looked back to see the other ones and they where gone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three flashing lights hovering over my neighbor hood then took off slowly after about 10 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
We were located on a catamaran in the exuma cays; traveling south
down the islands.  these objects were seen in the top of the sky
every night around 8:00 pm. (always after dinner)
we were sailing between july 5 thru 14, 2015.  i suppose the most
interesting thing about these sightings is we saw the same objects
when we were in the exumas back in june of 2010. the sky there is
extremely dark.  nassau is the closest island, but the light is 
not a problem (50 miles away).
someone has to know about these objects, as they seem to appear 
almost every night (extremely high altitude, but obvious).  a couple
of times our six year old grandsons saw the objects first.
i (accidently)found a phone number for autec; talked to a couple
of people there without much success.  they referred me to a 
naval facility in newport, ri.For a "freedom of information"
document. 
i was curious to know if you have filled an "information act" paper
previously regarding anything similar at this location?

best regards, and thank you!

lewis
content.summary: Very bright when accellerating, then dim when slowing....Or stopping

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine told me this morning that her and few others have been noticing lights at about 4 am, near the sacramento mountains, that last until the sun comes up and they disappear once the sun rises. she told me there was only one super bright light then once her and a friend went to investigate another one appeared and they became brighter once they go closer to it. she said its over the mountain and does not emit sound. she also stated that a few others have said it has been an ongoing occurrence for about a month. photos to follow later on.
content.summary: Two bright orbs over mtns, one appears out of nowhere.

content.detailedDescription: Observed very bright orange, red and white light from living room chair. went out on front porch to see what we thought was a fire on the mountain across from our house. realized it was not a fire or a plane. watched it travel at various heights. at one point we saw it from behind and it looked to have 4 bright circle shaped lights on rear.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed very bright orange, red and white light from living room chair. went out on front porch to see what we thought was a fire on the mountain across from our house. realized it was not a fire or a plane. watched it travel at various heights.

content.detailedDescription: I was replacing the metal roof on my cousins cabin at diamond lake. about a mile high in elevation. we notice jets are more vivid and brighter looking, we are climbing ladders to a 10-12 roof pitch, climbing to the south east horizon. we notice a big jet liner with 4 engines, more impressive than the 2 engine trails we see. as this big jet passes over us maybe 30,000 feet or so, we notice a star like light along side its jet trail, the ufo was already there, we did not notice it until the jet brought our eye to it. the jet passed on the trail drifted north, the ufo stayed put. it appeared to be higher in elevation than the jet liners flying over head. it appears to be a star to the naked eye, only in broad daylight. i take a few pics with my cell phone. cant see much, but a neighbor, driving by stops to say hi and encourage our progress on the roof. i'm working with my cousin joe, not the owner of the cabin but another cousin. the owner is on a material run to town. back to the ufo..We tell the neighbor, a prominent logging company owner in southern oregon, "hey we think we may have a ufo here". he pops out of his truck and observes the light in the sky after following a point of the finger. i ask if he has binocs or a good digital camera. he has binoculars, he quickly grabs them and sights in the object. we wait,,he looks surprised, says, "no idea what that could be" hands me the glasses. i sight in and am in total awe, everything i ever thought a ufo would look like and more, much much more. the object stayed for hours, slowly crossing the se horizon until the sun moved enough later in the day we lost it or it moved. when my other cousin got back from town we had own pair of binoculars we used through out the day to observe the object. at least six sane, sober, well known members, business owners of our community observed this event. the object changed shapes either by rotation or some other technology, emitting steam or smoke at times, cone shaped type emissions, at times we could definite disc shaped craft, others orb,and still yet others, it seemed to rotate and we could see structure with more rectangular like arms or fuselages, it almost appeared to be tumbling and changing shapes yet in a constant hover. emitting a rainbow of lights as it changed or the lights came into view as it rotated. the last time i observed it the first day, it appeared to have settled down, and was a perfect metallic like sphere. clearly visible was a shadow and reflection of a perfect shiny ball. sighting continued the next morning as i got up about 5 am, made coffee and stepped out to see the stars. in the same direction but a little more north on the horizon i noticed an extra bright star. as the sun rose and the light came and the stars faded away, this light remained in the sky. it did not really surprise me at this point. i was in fact happy it was still here. in the morning light it was more vivid than the day before since we did not notice it until around 8 am. the object continued on its se treck slowly across the horizon, glowing tumbling, changing shapes, we could stop at any time in the day and find it in the sky and observe it with the glasses, it was absolutely incredible. if u have photo enhancing equip i will be happy to share images personally. a few vids but my phone is not the best, i can clearly see the object looking at my phone pic on my phone, appears to almost reflect against the screen of my phone like a 3d sticker its very odd. i would feel confident in saying this morning now on the same horizon, the object sits, as it was yesterday afternoon the last time i observed it before coming of the mountain and back to town.
content.summary: We saw a hovering object in the sky for two days straight.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were watching for meteors during last perseid shower  this year (august 12, 2015 around 1:30-2:30am).  we were reclining in lawn chairs on our deck looking up towards the north sky.  a meteor had just zipped by and caught our eyes.  i panned the sky waiting for another and noticed how bright the stars were in arkansas compared to california where we moved from.  i noticed two lighted orbs moving horizontally in the sky, like a satellite, i thought?  i would compare the size of the object to the glowing on/off button on my computer. but they glowed deep orange, not yellow or white.  two separate orbs in a straight line heading east in the sky not changing altitude it seemed.  then they stopped under a cluster of stars, paused 3-5 seconds and the front one changed direction and moved up over the second orb.  they paused, then the one on top began moving away from the other one in a straight up or northern direction.  i went inside because i felt uncomfortable.
content.summary: End of pleides shower, two tiny glowing orbs glided one behind the other to ne position in 70 degrees approx.  they stopped, paused, and one went upward at right angle.  i went inside.

content.detailedDescription: Fue en agosto de 2.005 vivia fuera de la ciudad en un sector rural a 40 minutos de medelln,a 2.500 de altura sobre el nivel del mar,  llegamos a la casa finca en un lugar muy solitario y rodeado de rboles, entr a la casa, aproximadamente a las 9:30 pm sub al segundo piso y entr a la alcoba principal y corr la cortina y abr el balcn que era de una puerta corrediza de madera con vidrio, sal a mirar el cielo nocturno pues alli, se vean las estrellas y me par sobre el balcn cuando mir y estaba flotando a la altura de mi cuello hacia mi lado izquierdo a un metro y medio de distancia de mi cuerpo, un objeto de tamao como un baln de voleyball, tena forma de diamante, tena facetas, era metalizado color cobre oscuro brillante y me observaba , sent un gran susto pues sent que el objeto me estaba mirando, y analizando directamente a mi, grit, pues era algo muy raro, mir hacia arriba para ver si colgaba de alguna cuerda o algo, y no haba nada, es como si esa cosa estuviera escanendome, era una sensacin de que me haba ubicado y me estaba espiando pero que esa cosa no esperaba que yo la viera, entr rpidamente para llamar a mi esposo, cuando sal al segundo, ya no estaba por ningn lado literalmente se desmaterializ, corr por toda la casa, las ventanas, mir hacia todos los puntos cardinales y no vi nada ms, me sent espiada, perseguida, como si yo estuviera "sealada y me estuvieran analizando", ese objeto tena algo inteligente adentro , tena vida propia, y flotaba vibrando levemente y se balanceaba un poco de arriba hacia abajo y de un lado hacia el otro, sent como si ese objeto tuviera  algo adentro que pensaba y tena tecnologa, no se le vea un lente pero es como si lo tuviera adentro. y pensaba y saba esconderse.
content.summary: Objeto en forma de diamante color cromo oscuro flotando y observndome

content.detailedDescription:
One the night of sept. 18th, 2015 at approx. 2-3 am i awoke to my cable box blinking a green light below my television directly in front of my bed. at the same time this disturbed me i noticed a strong annoyance/ attack of  sounds similar to a high pitched dog. i heard a high pitched "bat" like screech followed by a series of "barks". it disturbed me a great deal and i was frightened to the point of hiding under my blanket and asking my husband next to me "why is the light blinking?". i believe i said other things to my husband but do not remember exactly. at the end of the annoying sounds came a clear message "green infrared light" which was not audible to my husband and leads me to believe that it was a telecommunication. i did repeat this message to myself but not aloud and continued to try to go back to sleep. at the same time, my husband got up and placed a picture frame in front of the cable box so that i would not be further disturbed and could go back to sleep. i did go back to sleep after gripping my husband from under the covers and woke up the next day with an inclination to research this information. i have no scientific experience so it remains mysterious to me at this point. also all wireless devices in my household had to be reset to obtain a wireless connection the next morning. 

the evening of sept. 20th, 2015 at 1 am was notable to me as well but no actual emergence of anything occurred. i mention this because of being woken up several times during the night on a "hunch" or extremely heightened awareness of a change in the environment. i heard the phone ring (downstairs)and awoke my husband- he did not hear the phone ring. to explain it simply- i felt electrically charged in all areas of awareness psychologically. all hearing and vision "highly tuned in" and alert for no visual reason. i reported to my husband the sound of one strange bark. he said he did not hear it and i tried to explain it as " a bark- but not a dog". the event ended with me repeatedly trying to sleep and repeatedly being awoken- again seeing nothing visually. my husband being awoken went downstairs and shut some open windows in an effort to investigate on my behalf, found nothing and quickly went back to sleep. today, after looking at the phone caller id- i see no listed phone numbers for a call being placed at or around 1 am.
content.summary: During sleep my cable box in my bedroom started flashing a green light. at the same time i felt assulted with audible sounds varrying from a sharp screach to an animalistic bark. "green infrared light" was the only understandable communication at the end.

content.detailedDescription: My fiancee and i were star gazing approx 2332 hrs when to the right of where we were looking  7 large,  round objects were traveling at a constant speed with the last object slightly further behind from the other objects.  objects were traveling the height slightly higher than the treetops,  and as the objects never reappeared once they flew behind trees.  with the exception of the last object,  the others had equal distance between them while moving.  objects were not chinese lanterns as people here claim as these objects were traveling horizontally at a quickened pace, which means they were too fast to be an airplane and too close to be a line of helicopters.  contrary to what anyone claims,  we know what we observed and it was unidentified.  we were actually in awe of how incredible the incident appeared.
content.summary: 7 red/ orange round objects traveling at a constant speed at treetop level

content.detailedDescription:
I took a picture of my sister taking a picture of a balloon during the balloon festival in pagosa springs on sept. 20th, 2015. we were outside a restaurant preparing for breakfast. i proceeded to take two more pictures of my own of the balloon. when i uploaded them, i noticed several orbs in the pictures, which i attributed to the proximity of the sun in the shot. however, in the second picture, there was a ufo. on closer review of the pictures, i noticed a "v" with a dot above it in the center of the orb closest to where the ufo appeared which is only visible in the first picture, containing my sister's camera and hands.

i didn't notice the ufo at the time; since the photos were taken in rapid succession i am left to assume that it winked in and winked out. i enlarged it to get a better view and it is clearly not a cloud, bird, or balloon. it is a white horizontal teardrop with a rose-colored aura "tail" projecting out the back (or front) of the narrow end.

there are time stamps on the pictures and the balloon was fairly close and low, as was the ufo.
content.summary: 3 pix taken in succession of balloon. ufo discovered in second shot.

content.detailedDescription: Nope
content.summary: Ufo capitol

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my son to school in carlisle oh. the time was a couple mins to 7:00 am when i turned left on to 123 on route to the school when we saw two flashing lights in sky a couple blocks ahead of us.I said to my son it must be a helicopter because the lights where stationary and not moving.As we got closer to the lights to are astonishment a few hundred feet in the air was what appeared to be a 747 passenger jet suspended in mid air.It looked as if it was frozen in time no sound and not moving.We passed it not believing what we had just seen so i turned into the next business parking lot.We were able to see the back wings and tail of the large jet.Not moving just frozen in the sky. we where at a dead stop in parking lot, jet was still there.I then told my son to get his cell phone out of his book bag and as soon as i said that the jet was no longer there .Just gone no sign of anything at all in surrounding sky nothing.I know crazy right ! true
content.summary: 747 looking passenger jet suspended in air like frozen in time for 4 min

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were outside around 7 pm around dusk looking towards the north we seen another flying are high rate of speed all of a sudden group into two sections and flew into different directions and disappeared  object was  bright in color.  did not look like any plain i've ever seen i worked at a military base as if you are and also located near to military bases barnes air force base and westover air force base never seen anything like this before and i've been around aircraft for years i'm just curious of anyone else seen what i seen
content.summary: optic flying towards north split into two directions

content.detailedDescription: On tuesday september 15th, i was at a meeting by the airport.  there were several of us outside discussing things and i heard a plane getting ready to take off so i walked around the side of the building with my 3 year old daughter so she could watch a little 2 passenger plane take off.  we watched it take off and fly towards the waldron, arkansas area.  i walked back to the group and she wanted to see it again so i told her it would be back around sometime and we would watch for it.  i kept watching for it but never saw it.  about 10 minutes later, i saw this reddish orange slim line vertical thing in the sky.  slim like a pencil.  it kind of resembled something on fire but it was very high up and towards the fort smith arkansas area.  i told my husband to look at it and he said that was the plane.  i kept watching it and it wasn't moving at all.  no blinking lights, nothing.  he finally agreed that it wasn't moving either.  there were 7 of us there and we all saw it.  i kept watching it waiting for it to move or some closer or something but it didn't.  so i turned my head back to the discussion for not even 20 seconds and when i looked back there was nothing there.  completely gone,no trail, lights, nothing.
content.summary: Saw a reddish orange slim line object in sky.

content.detailedDescription: In my backyard with my daughter, watching all the stars start to come out. we saw object moving at fast speed, changing colors, and realized there was no sound at all. i thought it was maybe a helicopter, it was low flying, but no sound, and the helicopters i have observed before were very loud. the object first appeared to fly in a straight line when we first noticed it, but as it got closer, it moved up, and to the side, up and to the side. i felt confused about why there was no sound, my daughter felt a little freaked out, because we didn't know what it was. it moved fast, and we watched it get further and further away, then it just disappeared suddenly. after it was gone we were in shock, we didn't know what we saw, and felt whatever it was it wasn't powered by jet fuel, since there was no noise at all
content.summary: Large object with 2 colorful large flashing lights, and changing different colors

content.detailedDescription: I arrived home just before midnight and as i was walking towards the house, i glanced up through the trees to see the stars.  i noticed some very bright stars and then that they were the wrong color, amber, and were moving.  they were approaching in a string from the west.  they did not blink like a plane, were round, glowing, and silent.  i grabbed my phone and tried to video them but my hand was shaking so much i was afraid it would be poor quality. (it was).  i ran into the house and yelled to my wife that there was a flock of ufo passing overhead.  i have never seen them before and never been a ufo buff so my wife took notice.  she quickly got up and came outside with me.  we stood on our balcony and watched them file overhead, one by one, eight to a dozen or more, like beads on a string, silent, glowing balls, one after the other.  they seemed to waver a little side to side like they are following each other.  as they started to move off approximately east by north east, we heard a plane sound approaching from the south and a plane came into view, wing tip lights visible, belly light flashing, unknown model of craft, but flying in the direction of providence, ri or maybe following the balls of light.  i cannot be certain it saw them or not, but it appeared to be at their height.  i would estimate over 3,000 feet, but far less than say, 20,000 feet, not aircraft cruising altitude.  the balls appeared to be at that level. we have discussed what we saw with our neighbor, the local police commissioner who also has an aircraft business, and have not found any rational explanation.  i have found a still photograph on-line from 2 hours earlier that night over michigan which is much better quality than mine and is absolutely identical to what i saw that night except i saw many of them.  oddly enough what i saw came from that direction. i apologize if this is a duplicate, but i have filled out many such descriptions in the hope of finding someone who has an explanation and i have yet to find anyone who does.
content.summary: String of glowing balls approaching from west, unblinking, silent, passed overhead

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright light noticeably brighter than the stars/moon, took a pic of it. . it disappeared then reappeared in a different area further north, i have pictures and a timeline because u saw a similar occurrence the night before, its just hard to explain typing this out
content.summary: Saw a bright light i know it wasn't a star or airplane disappeared the next reappeared

content.detailedDescription: First thought it was a hang glider when i saw it coming from an apparent turn into a level flight.  this is when i got better view of it and it appeared somewhat transparent from below with some black and green like edges.  i saw this when it was still had its wigs tilted in the turn. i saw some kind of design to it other than its' shape on the bottom of it.  it was traveling slow at first, then slowly speeded up until it disappeared from sight as it flew south / south eastward direction.
content.summary: Delta wing shape
